price: Tuliahidiwa haya sisi na baba zetu zamani. Hayakuwa haya ila ni visa vya uwongo vya watu wa zamani.
arabic: لَقَدۡ وُعِدۡنَا نَحۡنُ وَءَابَآؤُنَا هَٰذَا مِن قَبۡلُ إِنۡ هَٰذَآ إِلَّآ أَسَٰطِيرُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ
footnotes: Sisi tuliahidiwa haya, na pia baba zetu waliahidiwa hayo hayo hapo zamani. Haya si chochote ila ni ahadi za uwongo walizo buni watu wa zamani.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: laqad wuʿid'nā naḥnu waābāunā hādhā min qablu in hādhā illā asāṭīru al-awalīna
